January 30, 2018 2017 Content Highlights As we start a new year with a fresh outlook, here are the lessons we learned last year. <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=lessons-learned-in-2017]]>
01 Embrace predictability and structure. Cloud-Native Java: Designing Resilient Systems with Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, and Cloud Foundry Get the eBook <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=lessons-learned-in-2017]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=lessons-learned-in-2017]]>

The Upside-Down Economics of Building Your Own Platform Read the White Paper <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-upside-down-economics-of-building-your-own-platform?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=lessons-learned-in-2017]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/oct-4-getting-reactive-with-spring-framework-5-0-s-ga-release-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=lessons-learned-in-2017]]>
